name: indiscernibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is impossible to see, hear, or notice clearly: The objects looked identical, although there were indiscernibly small differences between them. Her voice is heard almost indiscernibly in the background music. Synonym
imperceptibly
More examplesFewer examplesShe claimed that the skin cream had, indiscernibly to the viewer, worked on her face.He makes these connections in his work only vaguely, almost indiscernibly.The image shrinks into an indiscernibly tiny point.The pitch of the note was indiscernibly low.
